comment.author: Connor
comment.text: It's time to implement Hillary's positive agenda for America. Vote Democrats for Congress and the presidency

replies.author: Cameron
replies.text: Unlimited immigration is positive for America?

replies.author: Connor
replies.text: Cameron has picked up bad habits from trump- xenophobia. Immigrants built America and continue to help build America. Throwing out fear mongering as trump does is not positive. Vote positively for Democrats in Congress and the presidency on November 8. Get out the vote for democrats

replies.author: Ian
replies.text: Positive as in hillorys hate for America?
